snippet: While most people in Europe and other parts of the developed world are being urged to tighten their belts, figures show spending on luxury goods and services by the global rich is higher than ever.
abstract: While most people in Europe and other parts of the developed world are being urged to tighten their belts, figures show spending on luxury goods and services by the global rich is higher than ever.

headline.main: Finding New Ways to Separate the Rich From Their Cash
